author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Solves issue reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34199#issuecomment-868960458

#### PR validation:

Run the unit test without compiling the package and found all the registered plugins in the release.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport is needed.
title: getPayloadData unit test, if no plugins are found, look in the `CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE`
